reviewText:
Thanks to random person from indiegala thread and be sure to check out waffles review
http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198092609182/recommended/408750


Pre review TL;DR:It looks like a mobile port but in reality it's more along the lines of a free flash port. with tons of leap of faith moments and gameplay that punishes you for going fast.


Pros:+Is frustrating if you like that kind of stuff

+Somewhat diverse music (all dubstep though)


Cons:-Tons of grating music

-Cant rebind any controls

-It tries to be hard by being frustrating and bull****

-Community is dead nonexistent lol

-The devs have updated it twice, and one of those updates was a needed update to make the game run after it was unplayable for a whole month, in neither case was it more gameplay

-Very bland and lackluster artstyle

-Low quality graphics and no resolution settings

-The view doesnt go far enough so in a platformer that you want to go fast you need to continually stop to check if you are jumping into a pit or onto a platform (and sometimes even checking doesnt help)


Reasons why its frustrating-The ball suddenly speeds up while falling

-Platforms dont reset each time you die

-No way to regain lives besides dying

-The screen shows far more on the left side than right, and you are always progressing to the right, this leads to TONS of leap of faith moments

-The ball is constantly and annoyingly perpetually bouncing

-Level 8 is INCREDIBLY annoying and getting any jump height upgrades" make it worse (im missing it by 3 pixels EACH AND EVERY TIME)

-Checkpoints dont count if you pass over them but rather you have to hit them


Other issues:-If you go to shop it plays music despite having music and sound turned off

-Tells you about mouse based control but doesnt mention arrow keys and doesnt use wasd

-For the unlock lines in shop
date:
green applies to the unlocked AND the unlockable items which is annoying


Waffles quotes:
"this game sucks more than a hooker"

"♥♥♥♥♥♥ dubstep is great when you get a headache"

"Add Waffles said it's an Osu! ripoff"

[LC] Waffles & (& Winnie) Bacon: ima make myself sick
[LC] Waffles & (& Winnie) Bacon: how to make anyone sick
[LC] Waffles & (& Winnie) Bacon: just make them play Starsphere XD


Post review TL;DR:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=noGRR6W-qdU
That video is about as enjoyable as my whole time in the game."
helpfulPercent: 13 of 20 people (65%) found this review helpful 6 people found this review funny

reviewText:
I was supplied with this key by the developer, this however did not affect the review. All my developer sponsored reviews are positive because I pick the good ones.
═══════════════════════════════════
OVERVIEW
First of all, this is not a rythem based platformer, even though it tells you that in-game, I saw nothing of the sort.
Secondly, this is a vary hard, fast-paced, score-based jumping platformer.
based on these, expect to die a lot, replay stages to improve your score, and be very happy to finish a level and go to buy new upgrades.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/408750/


═══════════════════════════════════
PROS & CONS
Pros:
simple controls, left and right and thats it
great soundtrack
colorful, electro theme
how the ball controls
challenging
addictive

Cons:
upgrades feel worthless
the lives system only serves to bother and annoy than to punish or encourage not dying
too many leaps of faith that sometimes lead to uncalled for deaths
some bugs
backgrounds remain the same throughout, it leaves you wanting for a change
the upgrade screen is a stage of itself that requires you to do  bit of platforming to reach the upgrades you want

═══════════════════════════════════
SUMMARY & FINAL RATING
6.5/10

this is a hard jumping platformer with an addicting nature.  its small, its light, its cheap, and it keeps you on the edge.
if you love simple/casual platformers with a challenge, then this is value for your money.

═══════════════════════════════════
